Item ID21693

A bowl of fish is a consumable item purchased from Mairin's Market found underwater beneath Fossil Island. Players can take out a variety of fish from it depending on the player's Fishing level, whereupon the bowl will be destroyed.

A bowl of fish will give an average of one of each kind of the following items: shrimps, anchovies, sardine, tuna, lobster, swordfish, sea turtles and manta rays. There is also a rare chance of receiving fossils.
